Rescue ET (yingbaobao) According to game design, yingbaobao, by chance, we obtain high-intelligent aliens with a link, and become a partner Quickly learn a very sophisticated yingbaobao UFO driving skills, and partners have been very precious gift, a flying saucer, it will be yingbaobao happy bad ... in this game, the yingbaobao needed to rescue those driving UFO , alien friend in trouble, take them back to their homes, Hush ~ ~! This is a secret, you must Privacy yo ~ ~ you are willing to help the yingbaobao and her alien friend? Come, take your mouse + keyboard, enter yingbaobao in the game world, with her an adventure! Instructions: W ------- UFO up S ------- down UFO A ------- UFO left drift D ------- UFO drift to the right Spacebar ----- rescue from the UFO issue at the bottom of light, where the UFO ET breath When the specified amount of ET after the successful rescue, there will be room for a black hole, driving into the flying saucer, you can return to his homeland ET Special Note: UFO very rare, to be especially careful not to hit the barrier! Fast Food Restaurant Fast Food Restaurant Finding People Take a role of a private detective and find wacky people your clients are looking for. Use your brain power to memorize their appearances, and find them as fast as you can! Lovely finding fault Cute style Matching Dinner Mobile You just graduated out of work in a fast-food restaurant to find a waiter job. Not think that this restaurant crowds as Bay, business and more red, various forms of customer tap a wide variety of dishes, how can you quickly these meals dishes, accurate to all customers before it? You work in a fast food shop. This fast food shop is so acclaime. In every seconds, there are so many customers to order a wide variety of dishes. Will you bring the dishes to all customers quickly and also accurately? Fault Line Fold away areas of the level to give your character access to each exit! Find 10 Differences on the BEACH Are you ready for a new Finding Adventure ? Now you must quickly find 10 differences between this 2 animated movies. Take a closer look at both images and click on the element you think is different. You will finnish the game when all differences are found before time to goes out. Good Luck! Police Differences Try to find 7 differences between 2 pictures as fast as possible. Have fun! Food Bank Delivery You have volunteered to collect food for the food bank. Your goal is to drive your truck, collecting as much food for the food bank as possible before time runs out. Earn points for every stop you make, and purchase upgrades to increase your collecting potential. Food Hunt Food Hunt is another simple flash game. Help the leader Antu to collect food for future with help of his followers. Food Catcher A game where you should collect the correct food for each animal! Don´t collect the wrong food and beware of lightning that falls from the clouds. Animal Park Spot The Difference Find all of the differences between the two pictures of this fun animal park. There are lots of cool animals all gathered but things are not all the same in each scene, have fun finding the differences! Quick Chocolate Cake Go purchasing for the substances for the best candy food you will ever create. Then when you get home put all the substances together to create a fast and simple candy food. Aquarium Differences Search aquarium for differences. Each aquarium contains 3 differences. Click on the left side picture difference to spot it, game contains 10 pictures. Complete game as fast as you can and receive best score! Spot The Differences–Caves Search for differences in caves! Each picture contains 3 differences, game contains 10 pictures. Wrong click adds 1 second to overall time. Complete game as fast as you can and receive best score! Good Luck! Puzzle Christmas Food–1 Christmas Food Puzzle page game Mexican Food Cooking Mexican Food Cooking Game. Food Vs Fatties Food vs Fatties is an epic platform jumper. Eat fatty foods to get higher and avoid healthy foods at all costs! Upon shef The Chinese food is world-renowned. Do you like Chinese Food? So play this game. The game offers 10 Chinese food, including nine as a hidden menu, you need to get them by your hard work. Game description: operation: Mouse pushed around a desktop to move the cursor to the food, press the left mouse button to access points. Victory conditions: Within limited times, the player's score greater than or equal to the task (the task for dynamic tasks, with the increase of food). State food At the top of screen is a status bar, representing different states of food. White: that food for a living, cannot be eaten, a score of 0. Green and white: that food can be eaten, with the green bar growth, scores become higher. Red: that food is best, the highest score. Black and yellow: that the food taste a bit burnt, black bar growth, scores low. Black: The food had been burned, cannot be eaten, score of 0. There is a score about cook level in the game. The higher level can make higher score, the number of score is increasing per time. Only the status is red, the cooking level can increase 1 point. Upon shef2.0 The Chinese food is world-renowned. Do you like Chinese Food? So play this game. The game offers 10 Chinese food, including nine as a hidden menu, you need to get them by your hard work. Game description: operation: Mouse pushed around a desktop to move the cursor to the food, press the left mouse button to access points. Victory conditions: Within limited times, the player's score greater than or equal to the task (the task for dynamic tasks, with the increase of food). State food At the top of screen is a status bar, representing different states of food. White: that food for a living, cannot be eaten, a score of 0. Green and white: that food can be eaten, with the green bar growth, scores become higher. Red: that food is best, the highest score. Black and yellow: that the food taste a bit burnt, black bar growth, scores low. Black: The food had been burned, cannot be eaten, score of 0. There is a score about cook level in the game. The higher level can make higher score, the number of score is increasing per time. Only the status is red, the cooking level can increase 1 point. Click here to cancel reply.
